title: Alternative Game Modes (Without the terrible AFK rules), How do you actually contact the admins?
body:
Thing is...gaming is meant to be fun..

Are there any game modes I can choose so that I don't get punished for being AFK? Since I'm playing CO-OP versus AI...what's the big deal. We're not being professional gamers, we are playing to have fun. It's way too strict on AFK.

If I can't go AFK occasionally there's not point playing this game. 

and...How can I contact the Admins..why is it so hard? are they hiding?

Thanks Team
**(fun fun fun) **
